Michele Bachmann , R-Minn., and Mike Pence , R-Ind., and former House Speaker Newt Gingrich have a lot going for them that their predecessors didn't. Mike Pence 's first radio show aired in 1989, and after the 1990 campaign, he devoted more of his energy to hosting what became a popular radio talk show in Indiana.
